name: Tumblr - Brittana icon set
description: Replace your Tumblr icons with a songbird (for Santana's song to Brittany), a unicorn, a heart, a cheer megaphone, and a daisy (for innocence and loyal love)! (Updated 02/13 to work with Tumblr's format changes.)
